results.text: በእርሱ እኽልንና ቅጠላ ቅጠልን እናወጣ ዘንድ (አወረድን)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በቀንዱ በሚነፋና የተለያዩ ጭፍሮች ኾናችሁ በምትመጡ ቀን ነው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
